text: Iâ€™ve done acupuncture, guasha, tuina, and cupping here. It was really effective in treating my sport injuries! Doctor Nie was extremely fast in locating where exactly is hurting, and her treatments were very effective in releasing tension and pain at the affected areas. Very transparent in their prices too as their receipt breaks down the fees that they charge very specifically. Thank you!

came here to treat my sprained ankle and the constant pain in my forearm from frisbee. after one session of acupuncture and cupping by Dr Nie, the pain felt much better

another time i pulled my hamstring and went to treat it by Dr Wu the day after. After just one treatment, the pain went from a 8/10 to a 2-3/10. highly recommend this clinic :)

Nie Yishi from Han Yi guan has been an exceptional physician for our family over the past 3 years. Her care has always been thorough, thoughtful, and compassionate.  We especially appreciate how she made us feel supported when my father had a brain stroke in 2024 . We feel truly fortunate to have Nie Yi Shi as our doctor and would wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking trustworthy, high-quality care.

Was having pains on my leg muscles in my daily walks. After visiting HYG for an recommended acupuncture treatment for just two treatments and my pain was gone and can enjoy my daily routine again. Tks to HYG.

Went here for acupuncture yesterday after a neighbour recommended them. The doctor was so nice and explained things slowly for me.

She used medicinal herbs during the acupuncture session and also incorporated some electrical pulses to some one area of my shoulder blade.During the session, the doctor will come in and check on you midway to make sure everything is fine too.

Haven't tried out other services but the acupuncture is definitely highly recommended!
